CustomField.description: wd field Displays engagement level for responses.
CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL( FCR_Response_Status__c , "Resolved - No Action Required"), "1. No Action Required", IF ( ISPICKVAL( FCR_Response_Status__c , "Legacy"), "1. No Action Required", IF ( ISPICKVAL( FCR_Response_Status__c , "Resolved - Already Engaged"), "3. Already Engaged", IF ( ISPICKVAL (FCR_Response_Status__c , "Not A Response"), "Not A Response", IF (ISBLANK( FCR_Response_Date__c ), "Not A Response", "2. Engagement")))))
CustomField.label: Response Engagement Level
